DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine which type of percutaneous nephrolithotomy is better in large kidney stones
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Pneumatic Versus Ultra-sonic Percutaneous Nephrolithotomy in Large Kidney Stones
DOC.detailed_description: While there are several retrospective studies evaluating the efficacy of different lithotripter in percutaneous nephrolithotomy, there are few prospective studies in this regard. This study was designed to compare the efficacy and safety of Ultrasonic versus pneumatic percutaneous nephrolithotomy in treatment of large kidney stones.
DOC.criteria: patients with >2cm kidney stone Pregnant women patients with coagulopathies patients with scattered stones who needed several accesses
